system.description: WHEN YOU SIZE UP A PERSON OR SITUATION roll +skill.

failure.label: Miss
failure.value: The GM might offer a straight-up lie, honest mistake or tragic misunderstanding.

partial.label: Partial Hit
partial.value:
Hold 1. Spend a hold, now or later, to ask a question. Take +1 forward when you act on the answers; give +1 forward to another and share in the outcome if
you prefer. Ask:

  • How can I help her?
  • What does he want?
  • What am I overlooking?
  • How could I get...

success.label: Full Hit!
success.value:
Hold 2. Spend a hold, now or later, to ask a question. Take +1 forward when you act on the answers; give +1 forward to another and share in the outcome if
you prefer. Ask:

  • How can I help her?
  • What does he want?
  • What am I overlooking?
  • How could I get...
